text: Shit the #BridgeCollapse tragedy has left me shaking, this could have happened to anyone.
Welcome to engineering in RSA. 20 years experience with no formal qualifications makes you a lead engineer in this country.. #bridgecollapse
@EMER_G_MED You've been quoted in my #Storify story "The heroes of the #Grayston bridge collapse response teams" http://sfy.co/f19Z6
